text: Kirchlauter is a municipality in the Bavarian Administrative Region of Lower Franconia in Haßberge in Germany. It is a part of the Verwaltungsgemeinde of Ebelsbach. ==Geography== Kirchlauter is in the Main-Rhön Region (Bavarian Planungsregion 3). It consists of the following boroughs: Kirchlauter, Neubrunn, and Pettstadt. ==References== Category:Haßberge (district)
title: Kirchlauter
